---
title: "madi_map"
format: html
---

```{r}
map_wns_pesticides <- tm_shape(counties, bbox = bbox) +
  tm_polygons(col = "white") +
  tm_shape(wns_pesticides) +
  tm_polygons(tm_vars(c("wns_status", "pesticides_quantile"), 
                      multivariate = TRUE),
              fill.scale = tm_scale(c("lightblue", "darkred"))) +
  tm_compass(position = c("right", "top"), size = 2) +
  tm_scalebar(position = c("left", "bottom")) +  
  tm_title("Pesticide Use and WNS Status by County", size = 1.2) +  
  tm_layout(legend.outside = TRUE, legend.outside.position = "right")  

map_wns_pesticides

```
